title: Tammy Hembrow flashes her derrière in a new sporty photoshoot
text:
She's no stranger to flaunting her incredible figure in racy bikinis and activewear.

And on Saturday, Tammy Hembrow treated fans to a glimpse of her derrière in a new video campaign promoting her fashion range, Saski Collection.

In the clip, the 25-year-old Instagram sensation is seen putting on a flirty display as she simulated playing tennis in a white halter crop and tennis skirt.

She serves, she scores! Tammy Hembrow (pictured) flashed her booty-ful derrière in a racy behind the scenes shoot for her fashion range, Saski Collection.

The blonde bombshell worked all her best angles in a series of risque poses that left little to the imagination.

Tammy, who boasts 9.9 million followers, even flashed her famous behind while bending over and pretending to pick up a ball.

In the footage, she is also seen kneeling alongside a female companion who was dressed in all-black.

Ace move: During one moment, the blonde bombshell, flashed her famous behind

Tammy received an array of mixed-comments on Instagram, with one user saying: 'You don't even play tennis.'

Another user wrote: 'Not sure if Serena Williams or Tammy Hembrow.'

Tammy's fashion range, Saski Collection, was established in 2017 and is named after her daughter.

Dynamic duo: She was later seen kneeling alongside a female companion who was dressed in all-black

During an interview with Woman Entrepreneur in 2018, Tammy explained how she built the brand from nothing with sister Amy the year before.

'We were really just figuring everything out from the beginning ourselves,' Tammy explained.

'We were printing orders from my house and counting and packing the orders ourselves.'
description: She's no stranger to flaunting her incredible figure in racy bikinis and activewear.
authors: Ali Daher For Daily Mail Australia
